dc_description_s: Panorama.; Shows view of Indianapolis from the top of the Asylum for the Blind.; Though credited ... as being 'drawn from nature' by E. Sachse, there is evidence that this view was actually done by James T. Palmatary, who is designated only as publisher--Map verso.; Facsimile.; Includes drawings of prominent buildings and views of building facades along Washington Street North East and Washington Street South East surrounding the view. Not drawn to scale
